member.summary: Gets or sets the columns of Kanban.

member.summary: Gets or sets the color palette for the item indicators based on ColorKey property of KanbanModel.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfKanban.Android.SfKanban.Workflows
member.summary: Gets or sets the workflow of kanban.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfKanban.Android.SfKanban.ColumnMappingPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the key which is used to generate the columns.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfKanban.Android.SfKanban.AutoGenerateColumns
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the column can auto generated based on the category value.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfKanban.Android.SfKanban.MinColumnWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the minimum width of the column.
member.value: The minimum width of the column.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfKanban.Android.SfKanban.MaxColumnWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum width of the column.
member.value: The width of the max column.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfKanban.Android.SfKanban.ColumnWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the width of the column.

member.name: E:Syncfusion.SfKanban.Android.SfKanban.ItemTapped
member.summary: This event will be fired when we tap on the item.

member.name: E:Syncfusion.SfKanban.Android.SfKanban.DragStart
member.summary: This event will be fired when we start to drag a item.

member.name: E:Syncfusion.SfKanban.Android.SfKanban.DragEnd
member.summary: This event should be fired whenever dragging is cancelled in following cases, Event can be cancelled.When this event is cancelled, item will not be dropped on to the target column.

member.name: E:Syncfusion.SfKanban.Android.SfKanban.DragEnter
member.summary: This event should be fired when a item enters a column. Event can be cancelled. When it is cancelled, DragOver events will not be fired for that target column at all and placeholder should not appear on further move over the same column.

member.name: E:Syncfusion.SfKanban.Android.SfKanban.DragLeave
member.summary: This event should be fired when the item leaves the column. So it means, this event should be preceded by DragStart or DragEnter events.

member.name: E:Syncfusion.SfKanban.Android.SfKanban.DragOver
member.summary: This event will be fired when placeholder appears in new position or whenever placeholder position changes on further move within same column. Usually this event will be called after DragStart or DragEnter events.

member.name: E:Syncfusion.SfKanban.Android.SfKanban.ColumnsGenerated
member.summary: This event will be fired when after the columns are auto-generated. In this event, user can change the header text of the column.
